item.title: Is Novocaine's Disorder Where You Can't Feel Pain Real? What Congenital Insensitivity to Pain Is & How Accurate The Movie Is
item.description: The 2025 action comedy Novocaine begs the question of whether the lead character's condition is a real genetic disorder or a Hollywood plot device.

item.title: Glen Powell To Star In Barry Jenkins’ First Movie After Mufasa: The Lion King
item.description: Glen Powell will join forces with Moonlight and Mufasa: The Lion King's Barry Jenkins in his upcoming sci-fi feature film The Natural Order.

item.title: Watch Out Pennywise: A New Scary Clown Is Set To Be Horror’s Next Icon - Meet Frendo From Clown In A Cornfield
item.description: ScreenRant interviews Clown in a Cornfield director Eli Craig, author Adam Cesare, and stars to celebrate the movie’s premiere at SXSW 2025.
